The user creates a small explosion in their palm. If properly timed and angled, it can be used to send thrown [[kunai]] back at the enemy. Gari has also used this to cut the length of [[binding cloth]] that [[Maki]] used to restrain [[Pakura]].

== Trivia ==
* While unnamed in the anime, this technique was named in ''[[Naruto Mobile]]''.
